cards.title: Carlton "Min" Rutherford
cards.text: Noon, Pay 1 Ghost Rock: If you have less ghost rock in your stash than each other player, unboot Carlton.
cards.flavor: "I learned more in one day with Master Fu than in all my time at Oxford."

cards.title: Lucretia Fanzini
cards.text: While in the town square during an in-town shootout, Lucretia may use abilities on her Hymns as if she were in your posse.
cards.flavor: "If she ever sang a dirge, folks'd be lining up to die." -T'ou Chi Chow

cards.title: Rhonda Sageblossom
cards.text:
Rhonda's Horse has the Sidekick keyword.
Whenever you discard a Sidekick from Rhonda to cover casualties, you may return it to your hand instead.

cards.title: Francisco Rosales
cards.text: Noon Job, Boot: Mark the Town Square. If successful, search your discard pile for a Sidekick or Horse and attach it to one of your dudes, reducing its cost by 2.
cards.flavor: "No one knows why critters like him so much. Must just have one of those faces." -Laughing Crow

cards.title: Ambrose Douglas
cards.text: Noon: Discard a card to give Ambrose +1 influence. If you discarded a spell or Mystical goods, you may unboot your outfit and its ability may be used an additional time.
cards.flavor: "For this sort of transaction, I don't take... money."

cards.title: Constance Daughtry
cards.text: During High Noon, Constance has +1 influence while at a Government deed. React: After you resolve an ability printed on your outfit, unboot Constance.
cards.flavor: "Why, oh why, could't I have found a quiet little library to run?"

cards.title: Tallulah "Lula" Morgan (Exp.1)
cards.text: If your outfit is , Lula has -1 upkeep per control point you have. Whenever you gain ghost rock from an ability during High Noon, gain 1 ghost rock.
cards.flavor: "Ah told ya this company'd be mine. Now, what to do next..."

cards.title: Darragh Mèng
cards.text: After Darragh successfully casts a spell and the spell is still in play, discard the spell.
cards.flavor: "The card tables in Gomorra have truly become an assembly of the strange lately." -Steele Archer

cards.title: Ol' Howard
cards.text: A deed with this card attached has 0 production and 0 control points, which cannot be modified. React: At the start of the game, search your deck for a deed and play it, paying all costs. Ol' Howard attaches to that deed, and permanently becomes a Condition and not a dude.
cards.flavor: "YOU CAN HAVE NOTHING!"

cards.title: Theo Whateley-Boyer
cards.text: React, Pay 1 Ghost Rock: When you discard a lowball hand containing a joker, attach the joker to Theo (do not ace it). Resolution: Boot a Hex on Theo to discard a card from your draw hand and replace it with an attached joker.
cards.flavor: "We need you, Nic. Your family needs you."

cards.title: "Mahogany" Jackson
cards.text: Whenever Mahogany joins a posse, discard the top two cards of your deck.
cards.flavor: She's a one woman wrecking crew... and Gomorra ain't gonna know what hit it!

cards.title: Travis Moone (Exp.1)
cards.text: React, Boot: After an opponent draws a card (into their play hand) from a card effect, draw two cards.
cards.flavor: "And here y'all thought I was a one-trick pony. But I've always known... I'm the real deal."

cards.title: Henry Moran
cards.text: If Henry is unbooted when you would reveal an illegal draw hand during lowball, boot Henry, discard the illegal hand, and reveal the top five cards of your deck as your hand instead.
cards.flavor: "He makes Bob Bidwell look like the luckiest duck there ever was." -Xiong "Wendy" Cheng

cards.title: Gomorra Lot Commission
cards.text: You may start this deed in play in place of a dude. Controller Noon, Boot: Discard a deed from your hand to gain 1 ghost rock. You may move one of your dudes to a deed with a name that matches the discarded deed.

cards.title: Wagner Memorial Ranch
cards.text: You may start this deed in play in place of one dude. Controller React, Boot: Before your dude makes an invention skill test at this deed, reduce its difficulty by 2. If successful, unboot the dude. If the invented Gadget was a Horse or Improvement, this deed gains +1 production permanently.

cards.title: Notary Public
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Boot a Government or Public deed that you own or control on this street. If you booted a Government deed, give a dude 1 bounty. If you booted a Public deed, you may move one of your dudes (without booting).

cards.title: Market Street
cards.text: While this deed is unbooted, increase the difficulty of skill tests made at this or adjacent locations by 1. Controller Noon: Boot this deed.

cards.title: Companhurst's
cards.text: You may start this deed in place of one dude. While you are tied for the lowest ghost rock, you are considered to have less ghost rock than all other players.

cards.title: Epidemic Laboratory
cards.text: Controller Noon Job, Boot: Your skilled dude leads a job marking this deed. If successful, this deed gains +1 control point and +1 production permanently.
cards.flavor: "There are no such things as applied sciences, only applications of science." -Louis Pasteur, Revue Scientifique, 1871

cards.title: Walters Creek Distillery
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Boot a Saloon or Casino that you own or control on this street. If you booted a Casino gain 2 ghost rock. If you booted a Saloon, you may discard a card to draw a card.
cards.flavor: "That's the real fuel that runs this town." -Clementine Lepp

cards.title: Silent Sigil
cards.text: The number of cards you can discard at Sundown is reduced by one. Controller React: After you refill your hand during Sundown, draw a card.

cards.title: Auto-Gatling
cards.text:
After this is invented, attach it to your home or to a deed you control.
This card's owner has a +2 stud bullet bonus during shootouts at this location. Unbooted dudes not controlled by this card's owner get -1 influence while at this location.

cards.title: Sunday Best
cards.text: This dude has +3 Influence during the Upkeep phase. React, Boot: At the start of the Upkeep Phase, move this dude to an adjacent location (without booting).
cards.flavor: "Well ain't you just precious!"

cards.title: Tusk
cards.text:
After this card enters play, draw a card.
This dude has +5 value for opposing card effects.
cards.flavor: "You can kill with any old thing. A weapon like that just does it with class." -Shelby Hunt

cards.title: Mountain Lion Friend
cards.text: Your posse has a +1 draw bonus while this dude is in a shootout. React: Before you take casualties, if this dude is in your posse, ace this card to reduce your casualties by two.
cards.flavor: "The heart of a wild beast is the same as a tame one It's the claws you have to watch out for." -Three-Eyes Hawk

cards.title: Spirit Steed
cards.text: Can only attach to a shaman. Noon, Boot: Move this dude to a location of a Spirit (without booting). Noon, Repeat: Boot a Spirit on this dude to move them to another location.

cards.title: Crafty Hare
cards.text: Shootout Spirit X, Boot: X is the highest value among opposing dudes in this shootout. This shaman leaves the shootout and moves to another location. If this shaman was the mark of a job, the job automatically fails after the shootout ends.

cards.title: Onward Christian Soldiers
cards.text: Shootout Miracle 4, Boot: All dudes in your posse get +1 bullets, and cannot have their bullets reduced or changed to a draw by other player's card effects.
cards.flavor: "We're marching as to war!" -Abram Grothe

cards.title: Turtle's Guard
cards.text: Resolution Spirit 4, Boot: All dudes in your posse gain the Harrowed keyword until the end of this round. If your opponent has an illegal draw hand, a 2-stud Harrowed Nature Spirit enters play and joins your posse, and gains the Harrowed keyword.

cards.title: Sight Beyond Sight
cards.text: Noon Hex 7, Boot: Look at one or two random cards in an opponent's hand. You may ace this card to ace a non-unique card you looked at.
cards.flavor: "Doctor... Hawley is behing it all... and it's far worse than we thought." -Lillian Morgan

cards.title: Requiem for a Good Boy
cards.text: Resolution: Discard a Sidekick in your posse to reduce your casualties this round by two. Unboot the Sidekick's dude. Send an opposing dude home booted.
cards.flavor: "Nooooo!!!" -Lucy Clover

cards.title: Fool Me Once...
cards.text: While attached to your home, each other player draws a card whenever you reveal an illegal draw hand. Cheatin' Resolution: Attach this card to the cheatin' player's home and draw three cards.

cards.title: Fiddle Game
cards.text: While this card is attached to your home, it has +2 production. Discard this card from your home after a Cheatin' Resolution ability is used against you. Noon, Job: Mark your home. If successful, attach this card to your home.

cards.title: Pigging Out
cards.text: Shootout Technique: Discard the top five cards of your deck. Search your discard pile for a Tao of the Zhu Bajie and add it to your hand. Whenever this dude uses a Technique that reduces an opposing dude's bullets, influence, or value, reduce it by an additional 1.

cards.title: Technological Exhibition
cards.text: Noon Job: Your Mad Scientist leads a job that marks an in-town location. If successful, choose a Gadget in your hand or discard pile. Your leader invents it without booting, reducing its difficulty and cost by 5. If you marked the town square, the gadget permanently gets 1 control point.

cards.title: A Piece of the Action
cards.text: Noon: Play a dude from your hand, reducing their cost by 4, to a minimum of 4; the cost cannot be reduced further. You may search your discard pile for a non-Gadget goods and attach it to that dude, reducing its cost by the amount this card reduced the dude's cost.

cards.title: Framed
cards.text: Noon: Choose an opposing dude and pay ghost rock equal to their influence. That dude's controller either boots them and pays you 1 ghost rock, or gives that dude 1 bounty. Noon: Give an opposing wanted dude 3 bounty.
cards.flavor: "But I'm innocent!" -Max Baine

cards.title: Plague of Grasshoppers
cards.text: Noon: Choose one or more of your unbooted Kung Fu dudes and select a location. Each chosen dude performs a Kung Fu test. Each dude that succeeds moves to that location (without booting).

cards.title: Foreboding Glance
cards.text: Noon: Choose your dude and an opposing dude in the same location. If your dude has more control points, boot all cards attached to the opposing dude. If your dude has more influence, boot the opposing dude. If your dude has more bounty, call out the opposing dude.
cards.flavor: "Small town, Hawley. I'm sure we'll bump into each other again." -Nicodemus Whateley

cards.title: Heretic Joker (Red)
cards.text: This card is only used for draw hands and pulls. You choose its suit and value. While this card is in your draw hand, your hand cannot be illegal. Decrease your hand rank by three. (Do not ace this card after use).

cards.title: Heretic Joker (Black)
cards.text: This card is only used for draw hands and pulls. You choose its suit and value. While this card is in your draw hand, your hand cannot be illegal. Decrease your hand rank by three. (Do not ace this card after use).
